page.title: 09FARMING
page.content:
FARMING STANTON HARCOURT
There are 10 active farms in the area.
1 {FRIARS FARM }part of Bury farms. 2 {BLACKDITCH FARM}(Mr J O Bury) Arable farm, covering large part of this area. Crops primarily cereal. 3 {COX'S FARM }(Mr. P. Deane, tenant) Dairy farm owned by County Council. Runs Fresian cows, has had problems since EEC milk quotas. Cannot diversify, strict tenancy agreement 4 {SUTTON FARM }(Mr Cook, tenant) Pedigree Fresian herd, mixed farm cereals. 5 {STANTON HARCOURT FARMS LTD} (Harcourt Family Trust) 1500 acre estate, mainly arable, some cattle, and sheep. 6 {THOMPSONS FARM}(part of Bury's) Dairy farm.
